name: LostX Dungeon
description:
Introduction

Lostx Dungeon is a dungeon crawler roguelike game, or a run and shoot game.
The player will find bizarre treasures that help him to defeat the monster in the dungeon, and try to get as far as he can.

Features
--------
- Lots of items,
- Random level generation,
- Different weapons,
- Lots of monsters,
- Temples and shrine to get more damage or other,
- Achievements and bonus/items unlock,
- Chest and keys,
- Merchant,
- Spells with cooldown
